task.title: Instance Detail - Volumes
task.shortdesc: This page shows you the details for a volume.

task.title: Volumes
task.shortdesc: This tab allows you to view and manage the volumes attached to the selected instance.

step.cmd: Click the Attach a volume icon to display the Attach volume dialog.

task.title: Context menu actions
task.shortdesc: Each tile in the volume list has a context menu. Clicking the action icon in the upper right corner of a volume tile brings up a menu of actions that you can perform on the selected snapshot.

taskbody.context: The following context menu actions are available:

step.cmd: Select this item to detach the selected volume from the instance.
